issue.title: [Rust] Implement dot-product in a compute kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
An efficient implementation of the [dot-product](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot_product) is useful for many machine-learning applications.

I would propose to treat null as zero for the implementation. This behavior is sensible because it corresponds to dropping any observation where null-data is present.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11115?focusedCommentId=17332193) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/164
